app_description: Fast scan translation of picture document card card and other information accurate identification of translation simple operation small size one key export read scan results. Intelligent collation and export scanning results intelligent segmentation one key read export TXT PDF Rapid identification of translation pictures documents PDF ID card bank card business card and so on Edit identification results support the fast scan results to make phone calls send e mail access to web sites see the calendar of events check the map check number machine number Chabang goods etc. use of advice To make sure that you can get a clear scan please take a photo: enough light to avoid jitter try to make the picture take up the screen
